title: ISic000965. I.Sicily inscription 000965
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΕΝΘΑΔΕΚΕΙ
2ΚΟΣ.ΑΝΤΙΣ
3ΒΟΝΙΦΑ
4Σ⳨Ω

Apparatus criticus

Text from IG and Orsi

English translation

Here lies Kostantis son of Boniphas

commentary
